definition: bubble milk tea (Tw)/Boba milk tea/tapioca milk tea/see also 珍珠奶茶[zhen1 zhu1 nai3 cha2]
pearl milk tea/tapioca milk tea/bubble milk tea

sentences.english: Adding milk to tea nullifies the heart-healthy benefits of the hot beerage , a new study suggests.
sentences.chinese: 一项最新研究表明热奶茶不益于心脏健康。

sentences.english: The incense floats , excellent music is beautiful , kind of milky tea had better immediately?
sentences.chinese: 香飘飘，优乐美，立顿，哪种奶茶最好？

sentences.english: Milk essence is the main ingredient in bubble tea.
The fifth tea is tea-drinking with pure milk, milk tea.
sentences.chinese: 第五道茶是茶与纯牛奶调饮，即奶茶。

sentences.english: But no ice-cream company wanted to support the show so it became a milk tea shop.
sentences.chinese: 但是由于没有厂商愿意赞助，冰淇淋店变成了奶茶店。

sentences.english: But she fell in love with this life is determined that a cup of tea.
sentences.chinese: 但她这辈子是决意爱上了那一杯奶茶。

sentences.english: Cardamom is often a spice also found in Indian cooking or Chai Tea.
sentences.chinese: 小豆蔻经常也在印度菜或印度香辣奶茶中找到。

sentences.english: Americano canbe changed to Milktea, Fruit Honey Tea , Cold Lemon Cola.
sentences.chinese: 美式咖啡可换奶茶，蜂蜜柚子茶，冻柠乐。

sentences.english: The Kazakhs treated us to their best cream tea.
sentences.chinese: 这些哈萨克人请我们吃了他们最好的奶茶。

sentences.english: Elcafe Milk Tea has sugar packed to suit individual tastes.
sentences.chinese: Elcafe奶茶另附糖包，供个人口味喜好作选择。

sentences.english: Cousins introduced her new toys and pearl milk tea.
sentences.chinese: 表妹介绍她的新玩具和珍珠奶茶。

sentences.english: Tony always buys a takeout milk tea on his way home every day.
sentences.chinese: 汤尼每天回家的路上都会外带一杯奶茶。

sentences.english: I just want to tell you how much I love your Milkmaid Tea.
sentences.chinese: 我只是想通知大家我是多么喜爱这款下奶茶。

sentences.english: How often would you visit our pearl milk tea shop during a week?
sentences.chinese: 你每星期会愿意光顾我们的珍珠奶茶店多少次？

sentences.english: When he drinks Lipton's milk tea, something magical starts to happen.
sentences.chinese: 每当他喝立顿奶茶时，神奇的事情开始发生。

definition: pearl milk tea/tapioca milk tea/bubble milk tea
bubble milk tea (Tw)/Boba milk tea/tapioca milk tea/see also 珍珠奶茶[zhen1 zhu1 nai3 cha2]
